title: Delaware & Lehigh National Heritage Corridor: Weather
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things To Know Before You Come     Weather              Weather       Weather and Climate  We have four seasons and the temperature varies 10 degrees from one end of the Corridor to the other on any given day. The winters are harsher in the two mountainous northern counties (Luzerne and Carbon) than in the southern-most county (Bucks).
